**English Writing Services Tender**

# Solicitation Number: CIHR 23-0138
## Issue Date: 2024-03-05
## Closing Date: 2024-03-25T14:00:00 (Expired)

**Overview**

The Canadian Institutes of Health Research (CIHR) Communications Branch seeks professional English writing services to support the development of high-quality, accessible communications products on health research topics for a general audience. The Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is for writing services in English on an as-needed basis, including:

* Research articles (up to 2 per month)
* Research profiles
* Website content
* Other communications products

**Services Requirements**

* Written in plain language, with minimal use of jargon or technical terms
* Ability to write in a variety of styles and formats
* Strong understanding of health research topics and current events

**Contractual Details**

* Estimated initial value: $60,000 (taxes included)
* Anticipated 3 Standing Offers awarded (up to 3 additional 1-year extensions possible)
* Selection based on highest combined rating of technical merit (70%) and price (30%)

**Estimated Order Value Distribution**

* 3 Standing Offers: $20,000 each (taxes included)
* 2 Standing Offers: $30,000 each (taxes included)
* 1 Standing Offer: $60,000 (taxes included)

**Contact Information**

* Caroline Roberge
* Email: caroline.roberge@cihr-irsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 597-9008

**Attachments**

* [View attachments on CanadaBuys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33523/cihr---23-0138---request-for-standing-offers---questions-and-answers-1-to-9.pdf)
* [View attachments on CanadaBuys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33523/cihr---23-0138---request-for-standing-offers---questions-and-answers-1-to-17.pdf)

Note: Only the required information is included, and the output is formatted according to markdown syntax standards.  There are links to attachments which you will need to verify.
